value.value:
Return a list of all the assignments in a Canvas course,
    with an id equals to the id specified as parameter.

generated_code:
from canvasapi import Canvas

def get_assignments(course_id):
    # Initialize a new Canvas object
    API_URL = "https://<your-institution>.instructure.com"
    API_KEY = "<your-api-key>"
    canvas = Canvas(API_URL, API_KEY)
    
    # Get the course
    course = canvas.get_course(course_id)
    
    # Get the assignments for this course and return them
    assignments = course.get_assignments()
    
    return list(assignments)
